reviews.review_msg: I took BUS315&413 with Emrul in 2021 Spring and Summer. He is the best finance teacher I have met in my life. He not only taught me a wide range of finance materials, covering the majority of the CFA curriculum, which built me a solid financial foundation for my future life but also strongly cared and helped me in life whenever I needed help.

Emrul is an amazing prof, probably one of the best I have had at SFU. Regarding the structure of the class, there is an individual assignment, group project, midterm, final, and participation/attendance marks. Tests can be tough, but are very easy to prepare for - he gives a good heads up on what to focus on.

Emrul's classes are't easy because the content itself is tough grasp. If you pay attention in class, take notes and do practice questions, you will do well. He will always take time to explain concepts if you are having trouble and cares about his students. Formula sheets aren't given in exams, but you will survive without it. Great prof overall!

Emrul is the reason why I chose Finance as a career. His lectures are extremely informative and also enjoyable. He truly cares about his students as he always gives us advice on how to prep for interviews and life in general. Not easy by any means, need to show up to do well, but you will get the most out of his courses vs any other. UBC is lucky

BEST PROF EVER. Hilarious lectures and very knowledgeable. Explained concepts in an easily understandable way. Exams are a fair game, so class participation really matters! Emrul truly cares about his students. Goes beyond during office hours by giving career tips and advice if it's your last semester. Recommend 100%

Emrul is my favourite prof at SFU. I took 2 courses with him: one econ and one finance and he teaches both with proper diligence. His courses are tough, but he makes them easy my explaining well. He is also always available when needed.
Emrul is the best deal! He is never boring in the lectures. The content was difficult for me but I liked the way he explained things. Highly recoomended if you want to do CFA in future.
Emrul is the best prof I had at SFU. He motivates students to a level that you start loving the subject materials. The course was very tough, but he made it enjoyable.
WORST PROF EVER. AVOID.

one of the most inspirational lecturer at SFU! take BUS 413 with him! you will learn a lot although you are going to die in the process due to so much material that he covers. but it is all very practical and important! would definitely take his class again! he has such great tenacity in the success of his students, which is AWSOME!

My second time taking class with Emrul. He is nice and gives amazing lectures. He will tell you the difference of using the concepts in studying and in real life, and also gives real examples. For this class, u need to put a lot effort to have a good grade, but what u learned is very useful.

Emrul is a very engaging and enthusiastic professor.  He cares greatly about the learning of his students, in terms of how the course material will help them in their future careers.  This is why all of the lecture material and assignments are extremely  practical and similar to the work one would be doing as a financial analyst.

Emrul is the best prof I have ever seen in my SFU career. He makes finance really fun even though the course is really tough. I didn't really like finance until I took his class. He inspired me and showed me the real world of finance. Highly recommended.

Emrul is not bad overall despite a few things. His course is a little bit disorganized and he sometimes makes mistakes. The instructions for the assignment and project are not clear and he doesn't want questions for the project. However, the good thing is that the MT and final are fair as long as you attend lectures, pay attention. Would recommend

Very good prof for the class, makes the material easy to understand and retain the information. His midterm and final are not too difficult given that you study his slides. Make sure you take notes and attend every lecture, since he might give pop quizzes. Most useful finance class I've taken and probably one of the best profs for corporate finance

One of the best instructor I've ever encountered in Beedie. Very support, always be there for his students. He teaches a lot of practical stuffs, which gets students ready for the real world (As a final year student you would appreciate this a lot). Grading is very fair, you get exactly what you deserved. last but not least, great sense of humor!!

He is funny and teaches with a lot of real life example. Gives career advice during the last class that's very helpful. Always there to help. I'm graduating, otherwise I would like to take more classes with him.
One of the best profs I've had at SFU. Good sense of humor. Very organized. His lectures are fun and very informative.  Choose his class and "you will thank me later".
Enjoyed his lecture very much. He gave many real life examples and taught practical stuffs. Good sense of humor. Career advice at the last class was very helpful.
Great Professor, the lecture is fun and educational. Very helpful!!! Real life projects and experiences
good prof, makes hard concept a lot easier than reading the textbook. fair exam gives you a lot of heads up about what's coming.  I would take his class again :D

Great Professor, is obviously passionate about finance. I enjoyed the lectures, he is knowledgeable and brought real world experience to what he was talking about. He covers a lot of material but outlines what is expected very clearly.
